start.description: Starts or Restarts conference testing. It will retrieve conversation details

resume.description: Resumes Conference Testing. It does not retrieve conversation details

setConfig.description: Configures conference testing. Use `conference conf [ENGLISH|ALL] [ONCE|ENDLESS] [time_between_tests_in_ms]. Defaults: Endless, English, 60000

status.description: Displays the status of the device

dial.description: Dials a phone number. Use dial [phoneNumber] [pin] [locale (Def: EN_US)]

shutdown.description: Logs out the bot from circuit and terminates the process
